CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 5, 1946, pg. 13, reads: "The World is His! - Ready, willing and able to take over the job of making a better world for the future, Andrew Derritt Jr., son of Mr. and Mrs. Andrew Derritt Sr., of Salisbury, Md. looks comfy with the globe on his lap. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Andrew Derritt Jr. seated on arm of chair and holding globe, in living room with Christmas tree, horizontal format
